title: The Puering, Bating & Drenching of Skins
author: Wood, Joseph Turney, 1865-1924

quoteFirst: It was (I shall never forget it) at precisely
quoteLast: when the night was lighted by an immense brilliant blue light. A few seconds later the whole earth shook and a horrible explosion rent the air. Then silence.
title: The Little Match Man
author: Barzini, Luigi, 1874-1947; Longstreet, Hattie [Illustrator]; Woodruff, S. F. [Translator]
